SPARK_BOT_URL.description: The address at which your bot can be reached. The public address of your Heroku app will be 'https://<App Name>.herokuapp.com

SPARK_BOT_TOKEN.description: The bot's access token from Cisco Spark. Create a new bot account at https://developer.ciscospark.com/add-bot.html if you do not have one.

SPARK_BOT_EMAIL.description: The bot's email address from Cisco Spark.

SPARK_BOT_APP_NAME.description: The bot's name from Cisco Spark.

SPARK_BOT_HELP_MSG.description: (Optional) Used to customize Bot Help Banner

MERAKI_API_TOKEN.description: (Required for Meraki Support) The API token from the Meraki Dashboard.

MERAKI_ORG.description: (Required for Meraki Support) The Organization ID from the Meraki API.

MERAKI_HTTP_USERNAME.description: (Optional for Meraki Support) Meraki Dashboard username. Used to generate cross-launch links from Spark client to Dashboard.

MERAKI_HTTP_PASSWORD.description: (Optional for Meraki Support) Meraki Dashboard password. Used to generate cross-launch links from Spark client to Dashboard.

SPARK_API_TOKEN.description: (Required for Spark Call Support) API Token for Cisco Spark Call Admin user.

S3_BUCKET.description: (Required for Umbrella Support) Amazon S3 Bucket name for Umbrella log import.

S3_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: (Required for Umbrella Support) Amazon S3 Access Key ID for Umbrella log import.

S3_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: (Required for Umbrella Support) Amazon S3 Secret Access Key for Umbrella log import.

A4E_CLIENT_ID.description: (Required for AMP for Endpoints Support) AMP for Endpoints 3rd Party API Client ID.

A4E_CLIENT_SECRET.description: (Required for AMP for Endpoints Support) AMP for Endpoints API Key.
